name: koillection
description: Koillection is a self hosted collection manager for physical or digital items such as books, games or gadgets. It lets users catalog items with images, metadata and tags and browse their collections in a customizable web interface.
features: Collection Management: Catalog physical items like books, games, and collectibles. Organize your possessions digitally.
Custom Fields: Define custom metadata fields for different collection types. Track information relevant to you.
Image Galleries: Upload multiple photos for each item with gallery views. Document your collection visually.
Tags & Categories: Organize items with tags, categories, and hierarchical collections. Structure collections logically.
Search & Filter: Advanced search and filtering to find items quickly. Navigate large collections efficiently.
Wishlist: Track items you want to acquire with wishlist feature. Plan future purchases.
Loan Tracking: Record when items are loaned to others with due dates. Keep track of borrowed items.
Statistics: View collection statistics, value tracking, and growth over time. Understand your collection.
Templates: Create templates for common item types to speed up cataloging. Standardize data entry.
Import & Export: Backup collections and migrate data with export tools. Protect your catalog data.
Multi-User: Share collections with family or friends with user accounts. Collaborate on cataloging.
Mobile Responsive: Access and update collections from smartphones. Catalog items anywhere.
